definition: to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract

sentences.english: On it came-on, silently and stealthily, to the bed's head.
sentences.chinese: 它走上前来，无声无息偷偷摸摸地摸到了床头。

sentences.english: I am tired of that cat and its thievish ways.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌那只猫以及它那偷偷摸摸的样子。

sentences.english: A furtive activity could become mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 偷偷摸摸可能成为主流。

sentences.english: Is you covertly goes to and her appointment feared the wife bumps into woman.
sentences.chinese: 就是你偷偷摸摸地去和她约会又怕妻子撞见的女人。

sentences.english: Then we would not have to furtively bye-mail conversation.
sentences.chinese: 那样我们就不必通过电邮来偷偷摸摸的谈话。
他偷偷摸摸地四处寻找钱。

sentences.english: Stop skulking around ; you can give a person a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 被偷偷摸摸地四周围走，你会把人给吓出心脏病来的。

sentences.english: Progress is an honest man; the ideal and the absolute do not filch pocket-handkerchiefs.
sentences.chinese: 进步创造正气，理想和绝对真理决不偷偷摸摸。

sentences.english: Be you go secretively and she dates again afraid the wife run into of woman.
sentences.chinese: 就是你偷偷摸摸地去和她约会又怕妻子撞见的女人。
